changeSet.author: fbiville

preConditions.neo4j:cypherCheck: SHOW PROCEDURES YIELD name WHERE name = "apoc.schema.assert" RETURN count(name)

changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CALL apoc.schema.assert({Movie:['tagline'], Movie:['released'], Person:['name'], Movie:['imdbRating'], User:['name'], Movie:['title'], Movie:['year']}, {}, true)

changeSet.author: fbiville
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT cst_movie_IMDB_id FOR (m:Movie) REQUIRE (m.imdbId) IS NODE KEY

changeSet.author: fbiville
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.plot IS NULL SET m.plot=m.title

changeSet.author: fbiville
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT cst_movie_plot FOR (m:Movie) REQUIRE (m.plot) IS NOT NULL

rollback.neo4j:cypher: MATCH (country:Country)<-[:IN_COUNTRY]-(movie:Movie) SET movie.countries = country.countries DETACH DELETE country

changeSet.author: fbiville
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT country_name_string FOR (country:Country) REQUIRE country.country IS ::STRING

changeSet.author: fbiville
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: MATCH (old:Country WHERE old.countries IS NOT NULL) UNWIND old.countries AS rawName WITH trim(rawName) AS name WITH DISTINCT name MERGE (:Country {country: name})

MATCH (new:Country WHERE new.country IS NOT NULL) MATCH (old:Country WHERE old.countries IS NOT NULL AND any(country IN old.countries WHERE trim(country) = new.country))<-[:IN_COUNTRY]-(movie:Movie) CREATE (new)<-[:IN_COUNTRY]-(movie) DETACH DELETE old

rollback.neo4j:cypher: MATCH (movie:Movie)-[r:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country) WITH movie, collect(country.country) AS countries CREATE (:Country {countries: countries})<-[:IN_COUNTRY]-(movie)
MATCH (country:Country WHERE country.countries IS NULL)<-[r:IN_COUNTRY]->(:Movie) DELETE r
